channel.title: Runserver Error...Shuts it down
channel.description:
first i get this..
[QUOTE]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:153) at client.stillgfx2(client.java:1106) at client.stillgfx(client.java:1098) at client.levelup(client.java:919) at client.addSkillXP(client.java:12053) at client.AttackNPC(client.java:28341) at client.process(client.java:14688) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:47)[/QUOTE]
Then this..
[QUOTE]java.io.FileNotFoundException: connectedfrom\_.txt (The process cannot access th e file because it is being used by another process) at java.io.FileOutputStream.openAppend(Native Method) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:177) at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:102)Client type[/QUOTE]
Last this..
[QUOTE] at java.io.FileWriter.<init>(FileWriter.java:61) at client.appendConnected(client.java:8418) at client.run(client.java:8622) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:595)[/QUOTE]
Anyone know? Help me plz

item.title: Runserver Error...Shuts it down
item.dc:creator: @Nintendo1 Nintendo
item.description:
@Nintendo1 wrote:

Your missing A LOT OF THINGS

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver Error...Shuts it down
item.dc:creator: @HeroFTW HeroFTW
item.description:
@HeroFTW wrote:

Lothy thx very much…This wuz the exact problem…works fine now :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver Error...Shuts it down
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

When you make use of reader and writer classes, be sure to use the close() method when done. Otherwise it doesn’t close the file properly, and nothing else can happen with it.
Although, it’s something to do with the connectedFrom folder… Remember that Java is a case sensitive language - connectedfrom_.txt isn’t the same as connectedFrom_.txt.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver Error...Shuts it down
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

Read the second error.

It says that another process is using the file _.txt in ./connected from.
Close anything that might be using it, or log out, and start the server up again.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver Error...Shuts it down
item.dc:creator: @Zaroyn Zaroyn
item.description:
@Zaroyn wrote:

you missing a file completely, you need a new source… thats the only way i can think of to fix it/

Read full topic
